channel.title: Trend Micro Research, News and Perspectives
channel.copyright: Respective post owners and feed distributors

item.title: 加速安全风险管理
item.description: In response to the expanding attack surface, Mike Milner, Trend Micro VP of Cloud Technology, explores the role security risk management plays in this new era of cybersecurity and how IT leaders are accelerating innovation.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Mike Milner

item.title: CVE-2023-46604（Apache ActiveMQ）被利用以感染系统并注入加密货币挖矿程序和rootkit。
item.description: We uncovered the active exploitation of the Apache ActiveMQ vulnerability CVE-2023-46604 to download and infect Linux systems with the Kinsing malware (also known as h2miner) and cryptocurrency miner.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Peter Girnus

item.title: ALPHV/BlackCat Take Extortion Public
item.description: Learn more about ALPHV filing a complaint with the Security and Exchange Commission (SEC) against their victim, which appears to be an attempt to influence MeridianLink to pay the ransom sooner than later.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 针对时间紧迫：网络事故应急响应计划
item.description: Conventional wisdom says most organizations will experience a cybersecurity breach at some point—if they haven’t already. That makes having a ready-to-launch incident response process crucial when an attack is detected, as this fictionalized scenario shows.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Chris LaFleur

item.title: 深入挖掘ChatGPT在自动化恶意软件创建中的角色
item.description: This blog entry explores the effectiveness of ChatGPT's safety measures, the potential for AI technologies to be misused by criminal actors, and the limitations of current AI models.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Veronica Chierzi

item.title: 100个盈利的季度：一位Trender的见解
item.description: Learn what 100 straight quarters of profitability means to a Trender who has been here for every one of them.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 威胁行为者利用文件共享服务和反向代理进行凭证收集。
item.description: We analyzed a phishing campaign involving malicious emails containing a link to a file-sharing solution, which further leads to a PDF document with a secondary link designed to steal login info and session cookies.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Buddy Tancio

item.title: 前10个DevOps失误及其避免方法
item.description: Integrating the necessary DevOps practices, tools, and cultures in an organization is difficult, even for experts. Learn how to recognize these challenges and transform them into valuable lessons when navigating the world of DevOps.
item.category: Trend Micro DevOps : Google Cloud Platform
Trend Micro DevOps : File Storage Security

item.title: 实施零信任：5个关键考虑因素
item.description: When implementing a Zero Trust strategy and selecting a solution to safeguard your company against cyber risk, there are many factors to consider. Five key areas include Visibility and Analytics, Automation and Orchestration, Central Management, Analyst Experience, and Pricing Flexibility and Transparency.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Alifiya Sadikali

item.title: 为您的网络提供“零日威胁保护”。
item.description: Explore the world of zero day threats and gain valuable insight into the importance of proactive detection and remediation.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Michael Langford

item.title: 保护云基础架构需要一种新的思维方式
item.description: Rising attacks on cloud infrastructure and services have created a ‘shared fate’ scenario for cloud providers and users, where a successful breach means everybody loses. Fresh thinking and closer collaboration can help avoid that outcome and better protect public cloud resources.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
item.author: Pawan Kinger

item.title: 为您的网络提供“零日威胁保护”。
item.description: Explore the world of zero day threats and gain valuable insight into the importance of proactive detection and remediation.
item.author: Michael Langford

item.title: 趋势科技被誉为客户的最爱
item.description: Customer feedback validates Trend's leadership in in XDR, endpoint security, hybrid Cloud
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Holly Fraser

item.title: Kopeechka（可备查），一个自动创建社交媒体账户的服务，如何助力网络犯罪。
item.description: This report explores the Kopeechka service and gives a detailed technical analysis of the service’s features and capabilities and how it can help cybercriminals to achieve their goals.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Cedric Pernet

item.title: 优化网络安全整合的战略建议
item.description: Say goodbye to security silos. Organizations are eager to take advantage of cybersecurity consolidation and make their security environments more manageable. Evolving incrementally and adopting a platform that supports third-party integrations are key to reducing cybersecurity complexity.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Greg Young

item.title: CI/CD 管道：如何克服设置挑战
item.description: Explore the most common challenges organizations face when establishing a CI/CD pipeline and how to strategically overcome them.
item.category: Trend Micro DevOps : File Storage Security

item.title: 安全补丁管理增强勒索软件防御
item.description: With thousands of applications to manage, enterprises need an effective way to prioritize software security patches. That calls for a contextualized, risk-based approach and good overall attack surface risk management.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 对5G基础设施的攻击来自用户设备：5G核心中的ASN.1漏洞
item.description: In the second part of this series, we will examine how attackers can trigger vulnerabilities by sending control messages masquerading as user traffic to cross over from user plane to control plane.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Salim S.I.

item.title: 软件工程中的前4个新兴趋势
item.description: Explore key takeaways about emerging software engineering trends from Gartner's annual Application Innovation and Business Solutions Summit.
item.category: Trend Micro DevOps : File Storage Security

item.title: 电子邮件安全最佳实践：预防网络钓鱼攻击
item.description: Trend Micro Research reported a 29% growth in phishing attacks blocked and detected in 2022. Explore the latest phishing trends and email security best practices to enhance your email security and reduce cyber risk.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 警告：Lumma Stealer通过Discord CDN进行分发
item.description: This blog discusses how threat actors abuse Discord’s content delivery network (CDN) to host and spread Lumma Stealer, and talks about added capabilities to the information stealing malware.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Carl Malipot

item.title: Void Rabisu以嶄新的纖身浪漫喜劇變種作品瞄準女性政治領導人
item.description: Almost a year after Void Rabisu shifted its targeting from opportunistic ransomware attacks with an emphasis on cyberespionage, the threat actor is still developing its main malware, the ROMCOM backdoor.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Feike Hacquebord

item.title: 预防勒索软件作为服务（RaaS）攻击的方法
item.description: Explore key insights on how ransomware as a service (RaaS) operators work and how to prevent ransomware attacks.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: DarkGate Opens Organizations for Attack via Skype, Teams
item.description: We detail an ongoing campaign abusing messaging platforms Skype and Teams to distribute the DarkGate malware to targeted organizations. We also discovered that once DarkGate is installed on the victim’s system, additional payloads were introduced to the environment.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Trent Bessell

item.title: 电力系统网络安全漏洞
item.description: Digitalization has changed the business environment of the electric power industry, exposing it to various threats. This webinar will help you uncover previously unnoticed threats and develop countermeasures and solutions.
item.author: Mayumi Nishimura

item.title: Exposing Infection Techniques Across Supply Chains and Codebases
item.description: This entry delves into threat actors' intricate methods to implant malicious payloads within seemingly legitimate applications and codebases.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Aliakbar Zahravi

item.title: 一个领导者的网络安全风险评估指南
item.description: Cybersecurity risk assessment provides the continuous asset detection, analysis, prioritization, and risk scoring needed to keep pace with a continuously growing digital attack surface.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 如何拥抱云安全挑战的思维方式
item.description: CISOs responsible for tackling cloud security challenges need to rethink traditional security practices, protect apps and infrastructure they don’t control, and justify enterprise security investments. Trend Micro’s Bryan Webster told the AWS SecurityLIVE! audience it can all be done—by embracing ‘cloud values’ and leveraging the existing skills of cloud development teams.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
item.author: Bryan Webster

item.title: APT34 Deploys Phishing Attack With New Malware
item.description: We observed and tracked the advanced persistent threat (APT) APT34 group with a new malware variant accompanying a phishing attack comparatively similar to the SideTwist backdoor malware. Following the campaign, the group abused a fake license registration form of an African government agency to target a victim in Saudi Arabia.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Mohamed Fahmy

item.title: AWS Graviton使用案例
item.description: Discover how AWS Graviton’s optimized processors help provide a superior price-performance ratio. Available for AWS-managed services, you’ll gain insight on strategies, use cases, and insight on how to get the most out of AWS Graviton.
item.author: Michael Langford

item.title: 如何提高网络安全意识和培训水平
item.description: Bill Malik, former Research Director at Gartner, discusses how to leverage the Capability Maturity Model to create an effective awareness program.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Cybersecurity Awareness Month
item.author: William Malik

item.title: 审查Turla APT组织的活动
item.description: We examine the campaigns of the cyberespionage group known as Turla over the years, with a special focus on the key MITRE techniques and the corresponding IDs associated with the threat actor group.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Srivathsa Sharma

item.title: 网络犯罪分子利用摩洛哥悲剧展开新的骗局活动
item.description: This blog entry details a scheme that exploits the recent Morocco earthquake by impersonating the domain name of a well-known humanitarian organization for financial fraud.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Cedric Pernet

item.title: 解码Turla：趋势科技的MITRE性能
item.description: This year, the MITRE Engenuity ATT&CK evaluation tested cybersecurity vendors against simulated attack scenarios mimicking the adversary group “Turla.” Learn about Trend Micro's 100% successful protection performance.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Shannon Murphy

item.title: 零信任采用：赢得领导层的提示
item.description: Implementing Zero Trust can be difficult due to outdated systems, employee resistance, and cost. Yet, the benefits outweigh the challenges. It is key to use a platform that combines multiple security technologies to simplify IT and risk assessment, proper planning, and getting security buy-in from stakeholders, including your board of directors.
item.author: Alifiya Sadikali

item.title: 针对用户设备对5G基础设施的攻击
item.description: Crafted packets from cellular devices such as mobile phones can exploit faulty state machines in the 5G core to attack cellular infrastructure. Smart devices that critical industries such as defense, utilities, and the medical sectors use for their daily operations depend on the speed, efficiency, and productivity brought by 5G. This entry describes CVE-2021-45462 as a potential use case to deploy a denial-of-service (DoS) attack to private 5G networks.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Salim S.I.

item.title: 保护网络化的IT/OT环境中的CNC机器
item.description: Networking IT/OT environments is a bit like walking a tightrope, balancing the pursuit of intelligence and efficiency against the risks of exposing OT systems to the wider world. Trend Micro recently teamed up with global machine tool company Celada to identify specific risks associated with industrial CNC machines—and how to mitigate them.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: William Malik

item.title: 在网络风险管理中默默无闻的英雄
item.description: Behind the scenes of the world of vulnerability intelligence and threat hunting
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Ed Cabrera

item.title: 地球Lusca雇佣新的Linux后门，使用Cobalt Strike进行横向移动。
item.description: While monitoring Earth Lusca, we discovered an intriguing, encrypted file on the threat actor's server — a Linux-based malware, which appears to originate from the open-source Windows backdoor Trochilus, which we've dubbed SprySOCKS due to its swift behavior and SOCKS implementation.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : APT & Targeted Attacks
Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Joseph C Chen

item.title: 拜登国家网络安全战略的主要要点
item.description: Major changes are underway, with new rules for federal agencies and updated requirements for public-private partnerships. We discuss the implementation plans for the strategy's first two pillars: defend critical infrastructure and disrupt and dismantle threat actors.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response
item.author: Jon Clay

item.title: 3个来自网络安全领导者研究的战略洞察
item.description: Explore the results of a Sapio Research survey commissioned by Trend Micro about how CISOs and other technology leaders are overcoming today’s biggest challenges.

item.title: RedLine/Vidar滥用EV证书，转向勒索软件
item.description: In this blog, we investigate how threat actors used information-stealing malware with EV code signing certificates and later delivered ransomware payloads to its victims via the same delivery method.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Hitomi Kimura

item.title: Azure对AWS开发工具指南
item.description: Azure vs. AWS — which should you use for your DevOps environment? Discover the differences, similarities, and use cases to make an informed decision.
item.author: Michael Langford

item.title: 在压力下管理CISO的网络风险
item.description: Overworked CISOs are struggling to deliver the cybersecurity results their organizations expect. Fortunately, there are concrete and practical ways they can make their lives easier—while managing cyber risk effectively.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response

item.title: TrickBot和Conti制裁：对CISO和董事会的影响
item.description: Discover what the increased regulatory risk due to recent US and UK sanctions imposed on TrickBot and Conti cybercriminals mean for CISOs and board members.
item.author: Ed Cabrera

item.title: TrickBot和Conti制裁：对CISO和董事会的影响
item.description: Discover what the increased regulatory risk due to recent US and UK sanctions imposed on TrickBot and Conti cybercriminals mean for CISOs and board members.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Ed Cabrera

item.title: 如何将 Zero Trust 和 XDR 结合使用
item.description: As the Zero Trust approach gains momentum, more organizations are looking to apply it to their security strategy. Learn how XDR and Zero Trust work together to enhance your security posture.
item.category: Trend Micro CISO : Detection and Response

item.title: 分析一个用Node.js编写的Facebook个人资料窃取器
item.description: We analyze an information stealer written in Node.js, packaged into an executable, exfiltrated stolen data via both Telegram bot API and a C&C server, and employed GraphQL as a channel for C&C communication.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Jaromir Horejsi

item.title: 重新审视16shop钓鱼工具包，趋势-国际刑警组织合作伙伴关系
item.description: In this entry, we summarize the security analyses and investigations done on phishing-as-a-service 16shop through the years. We also outline the partnership between Trend Micro and Interpol in taking down the main administrators and servers of this massive phishing campaign.
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Paul Pajares

item.title: Qakbot扑灭行动：前路漫漫
item.description: A long and challenging journey against cybercrime around the world
item.category: Trend Micro Research : Articles, News, Reports
item.author: Ed Cabrera
